findings.title: Incorrect comparison operator allows arbitrary withdrawals
findings.explanation: The withdraw function uses `require(amount >= balances[msg.sender])` instead of `amount <= balances[msg.sender]`, allowing any caller to withdraw amounts greater than or equal to their balance and drain arbitrary ether from the contract.
findings.fix_suggestion: Change the comparison to `require(amount <= balances[msg.sender]);` so that users can only withdraw up to their deposited balance.

unmatched_predictions.title: Incorrect comparison operator allows arbitrary withdrawals
